text.text_translated:
Wasfia Nazreen saw a hula hoop when she was a girl.  
She saw a child from another country playing with it in Bangladesh.  
In Bangladesh many people say girls should not play with hula hoops.  
They also say girls should not ride bikes.  
Wasfia only watched the child.  
Later she climbed the seven highest mountains in the world.  
She climbed Everest and Kilimanjaro.  
She was the first person to hula‑hoop on each mountain top.  
In her country many people say girls should not do sports.  
She does this to show that girls can be strong and can do sports.
